text:
Hello.
You've got a very stylish one here...

Our specialty is... these baked sweets.
They go well with tea.

Since you're here, how about trying one?
Shall I brew some tea?

Done!
Got a bit nervous because of the ad-lib.

You handled it well, thank you.
The shopkeeper seemed quite laid-back.

Haha, I know what you mean.
Talking to them was kind of soothing.
The souvenirs and tea were delicious!
